attributes.action: The future of South London Healthcare Trust
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the Secretary of State for Health, and other relevant NHS bodies, to ensure that all the services currently provided by the hospitals and other healthcare centres within the South London Healthcare Trust are maintained at least at current standards, if not improved, without being privatised or outsourced and remain accessible to patients requiring such services, following the intervention of the Trust Special Administrator.

rejection.details: Please see: Save South London Healthcare NHS Trust
